weekly_top_story.headline: Israeli Airstrike on Gaza Hospital Kills at Least 20, Including 5 Journalists
weekly_top_story.summary: An Israeli strike on a hospital in Gaza city resulted in the deaths of at least 20 people, including five journalists, prompting strong international condemnation and calls for accountability amid ongoing conflict in the region.

stories.headline: South Korean President Proposes Meeting Between Trump and Kim Jong Un This Year
stories.summary: South Korea's President Lee Jae Myung proposed a summit between US President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un in 2025, aiming to revive diplomacy and reduce regional tensions.

stories.headline: US Issues Notice to India Ahead of Trump's 50% Tariff Deadline
stories.summary: The United States warned India regarding impending trade tariffs set to take effect under President Trump's directive, signaling potential economic repercussions and pressure on bilateral trade relations.
